ArchivePolicyDefinition.name: ArchivePolicyDefinition
ArchivePolicyDefinition.description: Represents a data lifecycle policy that, in each row, defines the scope, frequency, and rules for automated archiving or purging of records from a root entity, such as Contact or Lead.

DataProtectionThreshold.description: Specifies a retention buffer, in days, during which recently updated or sensitive records must not be archived or deleted. Enforces data protection compliance.

Description.description: The purpose or scope of the policy.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the policy is active and eligible for execution. Only active policies can be executed by scheduled or manual processes.

Name.description: The unique name assigned to the policy.

Type.description: Process type that the policy executes. Valid values are: Archive Import Purge

Query.description: A complete SOQL or custom query defining the set of records to archive or purge, based on policy rules. Determines which records are eligible for processing.

QueryLimit.description: The maximum number of root records this policy can process in a single run. Used to throttle execution for scalability and control.

RootEntityName.description: The API name of the Salesforce object targeted by the policy. Determines which object’s records are queried and processed.

RunFrequency.description: Specifies how often the policy is executed—manually or on a regular interval. Enables automation for recurring data lifecycle operations.Valid values are: NoneThis option is specifically for manual policy runs. Daily Weekly Monthly

ArchivePolicyDefinition.accessRules: Create, Update, and Delete operations are restricted to the Archive Admin profile. All other profiles have Read-Only access.
